The style.css file now has one of your customised box

```
.box {
  padding: 1em;
  background: transparent;
  color: black;
  border: 2px solid orange;
  border-radius: 10px;
}
.center {
  text-align: center;
}
```


Using `fig.topcaption=TRUE` so that figure captions are above the figures. 

A great website to paste text to markdown: https://euangoddard.github.io/clipboard2markdown/
